fullText:
Can a robot learn what its own body looks like — just by watching itself move?

W/Neural Jacobian Fields (NJF), CSAIL researchers show that it can. Using just one external camera, NJF enables robots to infer the structure of their joints & limbs — no built-in sensors or prior https://t.co/fYyEBv3SkP
